id.description: The opaque resource ID that uniquely identifies the resource.

bundleId.description: The bundle ID for your app. This ID must match the one you use in Xcode. The bundle ID cannot be changed after you upload your first build.

name.description: The name of your app as it will appear in the App Store. The maximum length is 30 characters.

primaryLocale.description: The primary locale for your app. If localized app information isnâ€™t available in an App Store territory, the information from your primary language is used instead.

sku.description: A unique ID for your app that is not visible on the App Store.
